txt.en:
'You've been an immense help, [placeholder].

Would you be so kind as to report our findings to Captain Brackenbrook?

Thank you.'
'This is most disturbing news, [placeholder].  We must notify my son immediately.'
'Captain Brackenbrook is in the tavern to the west of here.  Be sure to tell him what we've learned from Calder Cob.'
With your help, Ned Pruner has managed to interrogate the prisoner, Calder Cob.\n\nNed has asked you to present your findings to Captain Brackenbrook.
Ned Pruner has asked you to report your findings to Captain Brackenbrook.
Must be completed prior to the \qIntroduction.\q
